Lecrae is a great example of God's word. He speaks of his imperfections, yet recognizes the loving power of God's grace. He delivers SCRIPTURE in a form that MANY (young and older) can HEAR. As he said in one of his songs, "he plays the background" very well and graciously brings God to the light.

t: Lecrae - Rehab: The Overdose - Amazon.com Music
s: This album only has 11 tracks, compared to the 17 on Rehab. I think this album was part sequel, part overflow, because I think Lecrae wanted to feature the guys on this album on Rehab, but that would have made it too long, so he churned out a few more songs and thus, The Overdose.

t: Lecrae - After The Music Stops - Amazon.com Music
s: I did not hear of Lecrae until I got to college and one of my friends introduced me to him. I cannot believe that I have never heard of him. I am glad I did. This album is beyond amazing. I play it all the at home and in the car so much, that my friends and family ask for it.
